titles.title: For the relief of Fanie Phily Mateo Angeles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 10.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 103-581.
Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H6558)
Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Sensenbrenner the House passed over the measure without prejudice.

bill.summary: 5/11/1993--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
